Title: Kabi Usagi (2016)
Description: ['Four years after the original ', Kabi Usagi, ' shorts, a new episode was released. This was longer than the original, contained smoother animation, was fully voiced (unlike the original which has no voice acting), and numbered as "story 01." A series/additional numbered shorts were expected under this franchise revival but it never came to fruition after this first episode.']
Related: ['Parent story: Kensaku to Enjin no ABC Days']
